title: Call announcing
content: Just moved from flip phone to pixel 4a 5g want phone to announce name of incoming caller. Google says go to accessibility and choose text to speech and then incoming calls. Have android 11 and that option I cannot find. Can't believe a 5 year old flip phone could do this simple task and new smartphone cant  please help
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
